channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Prepare For ‘The Super Mario Galaxy Movie’ With These Toys
item.description: Jakks Pacific has a wave of toys and figures for the 'Super Mario Galaxy Movie' that you'll want to add to your shelf ASAP.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Rivian’s savior
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: Microsoft has some bright ideas for keeping future data centers cool - but will they ever really come to fruition?
item.description: Microsoft explores high-temperature superconducting cables to reduce energy losses, improve data center efficiency, and allow more compact, sustainable power delivery.

item.title: How to watch Dark Winds season 4 online from anywhere
item.description: Here's how to watch Dark Winds Season 4 online from anywhere as ancient beliefs, deadly secrets, and justice collide in the new season.

item.title: Stickerbox is the kids’ toy adults are obsessed with, including me — here’s how I got on when I tried the viral AI toy for the first time
item.description: Stickerbox has been all over my TikTok feed, and I finally got my hands on one.

item.title: Yamaha’s elite Dolby Atmos surround soundbar had a key weakness – and it made me freshly appreciate one of the more forgotten parts of the home theater experience
item.description: They may not seem the most important, but rear speakers can make or break an immersive setup, as I discovered after testing a Yamaha soundbar.

item.title: Honor Magic 8 Pro vs Samsung Galaxy S25 : comment choisir le meilleur téléphone haut de gamme ?
item.description: Alors que Samsung s'apprête à sortir le Galaxy S26, comment se défend son prédécesseur face au Honor Magic 8 Pro ? On les compare pour vous aider à bien choisir votre prochain smartphone !

item.title: Pentagon Reportedly Hopping Mad at Anthropic for Not Blindly Supporting Everything Military Does
item.description: Autonomous drone swarms and mass surveillance are apparently big sticking points for the AI colossus.

item.title: What the Epstein files reveal about EV startups and Silicon Valley
item.description: Will the Epstein revelations lead to broader fallout in Silicon Valley?

item.title: Here are the 55 best Presidents Day deals we’ve found so far
item.description: Deals have been admittedly pretty dry since the holidays, but now that February is in full swing, we’re starting to see strong discounts return across a range of categories. In fact, thanks to Valentine’s Day, the Super Bowl, and — as of this weekend — Presidents Day, retailers are once again offering a slew of […]

item.title: Boulanger casse le prix de ce solide moniteur gaming de 32 pouces (4K, QD-OLED, 165 Hz)
item.description: Les écrans OLED gaming demandent un budget conséquent, mais cette fois, Boulanger rend cette technologie plus accessible grâce à cette offre sur le Gigabyte AORUS FO32U. C’est un excellent moniteur 4K QD‑OLED taillé pour le jeu qui profite d’une baisse de 200 euros.

item.title: I’ve fallen for a game about fighting a deadly plague — and it’s the perfect antidote to the industry’s GenAI blight
item.description: In a battle to the death with AI slop, this is the game I’d send in to finish the job.

item.title: How to get into a16z’s super-competitive Speedrun startup accelerator program
item.description: TechCrunch spoke to a16z partner Joshua Lu for some tips on standing out for the Speedrun program.

item.title: Hollywood isn’t happy about the new Seedance 2.0 video generator
item.description: Hollywood organizations are pushing back against a new AI video model called Seedance 2.0, which they say has quickly become a tool for “blatant” copyright infringement.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Terminator Zero’ Anime Scrapped After One Season
item.description: The audience apparently just wasn't there for 'Terminator Zero,' so the franchise is in stasis once more.

item.title: I've found the 11 best Apple deals from Amazon's Presidents' Day sale — AirPods, iPads and smartwatches from $99
item.description: I've found the 11 best Apple deals from Amazon's President's Day sale, including record-low prices on AirPods, iPads, smartwatches, and MacBooks.
